title: W. N. Bergan–J. C. Lauber Company Building
text: W. N. Bergan–J. C. Lauber Company Building is a historic manufacturing complex located at <a href="South%20Bend%2C%20Indiana">South Bend</a>, <a href="St.%20Joseph%20County%2C%20Indiana">St. Joseph County, Indiana</a>. The original Bergan Building was built in 1882, and is a two-story, <a href="Italianate%20architecture">Italianate</a> style brick industrial building. It features an ornate cornice and frieze. Also on the property are two one-story contributing brick buildings. The buildings have housed the J. C. Lauber Sheet Metal Company, Inc. since 1900. It was listed on the <a href="National%20Register%20of%20Historic%20Places">National Register of Historic Places</a> in 1999.
